Title: Requires covered businesses to annually report to the department of labor regarding the impact of artificial intelligence on hiring and business practices for the previous year
Summary: Requires covered businesses to annually report to the department of labor regarding the impact of artificial intelligence on hiring and business practices for the previous year; requires the department of labor to file an annual report on the impact of artificial intelligence on hiring and business practices in the state; establishes penalties for covered business that fail to submit such reports.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring covered businesses to submit annual reports on the impact of artificial intelligence on hiring and business practices
